meaningMnemonic: Your <radical>spirit</radical> should feel <radical>humble</radical> before a <kanji>god</kanji>'s <kanji>spirit</kanji>. You never really feel humble in front of anyone else, but if you meet a god's spirit… Well, you should probably lower yourself appropriately. Gods have powerful spirits.
readingMnemonic: When you meet a <kanji>god</kanji>'s <kanji>spirit</kanji>, you need to get down on your <reading>shin</reading>s (しん). Get down on your ankles? No, not low enough. Knees? No, no, get your shins flat on the ground to show how humble you really are. Luckily, you're wearing <reading>jean</reading>s (じん), so at least that will stop your poor shins getting chafed!
